Title: Year of the Monkey
Actors: Igor Angelov, Bereda Reshit, Marija Kohn, Faik Mefailoski
Plot: A mild political satire about a peculiar friendship between a lonesome monkey and an (impoverished) zoo warden, and about an upside-down world in transition as seen by a chimpanzee.
Country: Republic of Macedonia, Serbia, Slovenia, Kosovo
